<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    VMap&#91;&amp;BB&#93; = CBB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is only legal to clone a function if a block address within that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function is never referenced outside of the function.  Given that, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// want to map block addresses from the old function to block addresses in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the clone. (This is different from the generic ValueMapper</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implementation, which generates an invalid blockaddress when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cloning a function.)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When we remap instructions within the same module, we want to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplicating inlined DISubprograms, so record all subprograms we find as we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplicate instructions and then freeze them in the MD map. We also record</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// information about dbg.value and dbg.declare to avoid duplicating the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debuginfofinder">DebugInfoFinder</a> DIFinder;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Track the subprogram attachment that needs to be cloned to fine-tune the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mapping within the same module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Changes &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abe00617fc34ceb1aa0eb62995732b30aa1e500d8286088d431dc693a52a29d6aa">CloneFunctionChangeType::DifferentModule</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is only legal to clone a function if a block address within that</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Eagerly constant fold the newly cloned instruction. If successful, add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a mapping to the new value. Non-constant operands may be incomplete at</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This works exactly like CloneFunctionInto,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// except that it does some simple constant prop and DCE on the fly.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// effect of this is to copy significantly less code in cases where (for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// example) a function call with constant arguments is inlined, and those</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// constant arguments cause a significant amount of code in the callee to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// dead.  Since this doesn&#39;t produce an exact copy of the input, it can&#39;t be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// used for things like CloneFunction or CloneModule.</span></CodeLine>
